scripts.docker-build: set -a && source .env && set +a && docker build -f apps/web/Dockerfile . -t $DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME
scripts.docker-build-target: set -a && source .env && set +a && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -f apps/web/Dockerfile . -t $DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME --push
scripts.deploy-image: kubectl apply -f ops/k8s/web.yaml && kubectl rollout restart deployment web-app
scripts.deploy: pnpm docker-build-target && kubectl apply -f ops/k8s/web.yaml && kubectl rollout restart deployment web-app
